price: គេមិនផ្ដល់វ៉ាហ៊ីឱ្យខ្ញុំ ក្រៅពីឱ្យខ្ញុំធ្វើជាអ្នកដាស់តឿន ព្រមានដ៏ច្បាស់លាស់នោះឡើយ។
arabic: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: in yūḥā ilayya illā annamā anā nadhīrun mubīnun
